item.title: I-26 West Approaching Sams Gap
item.description: I-26 west approaching Sams Gap. Use left two lanes for I-26 West/Johnson City. Trucks use right lane for brake check area.

item.title: Future I-26 West - Madison County
item.description: Entering Madison County on Future I-26 West crossing Ivy Creek. Ivy Creek is part of the French Broad River Basin.
